eventDecorators.name: AgainstPeriodsUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the againstPeriods value has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: ClaimDelayUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the claimDelay value has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: CommunityDonationRatioUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the communityDonationRatio value has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: DonationAdded
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a donation has been added.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token after conversion.

parameterDecorators.name: target
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the receiver (community or treasury) or address of the DonationMiner contract otherwise.

eventDecorators.name: RewardClaimed
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a donor has claimed his reward.

eventDecorators.name: RewardClaimedPartial
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a donor has claimed his reward.

parameterDecorators.name: lastRewardPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: Number of the last reward period for witch the claim was made.

eventDecorators.name: RewardPeriodParamsUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when reward period params have been updated.

parameterDecorators.name: newDecayDenominator
parameterDecorators.description: New decayDenominator value For further information regarding each parameter, see *DonationMiner* smart contract initialize method.

eventDecorators.name: RewardStaked
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a donor has staked his reward.

eventDecorators.name: RewardStakedPartial
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when a donor has staked his reward.

parameterDecorators.name: lastRewardPeriod
parameterDecorators.description: Number of the last reward period for witch tha stake was made.

eventDecorators.name: StakingDonationRatioUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the stakingDonationRatio value has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: StakingUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the staking address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: TransferERC20
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when an amount of an ERC20 has been transferred from this contract to an address.

eventDecorators.name: TreasuryUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

functionDecorators.name: apr
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the APR of a user based on his staking.

functionDecorators.name: calculateClaimableRewards
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the rewards from ended reward periods of a donor.

returnDecorators.description: claimAmount uint256 sum of all donor's rewards that has not been claimed until _lastPeriodNumber.

functionDecorators.name: calculateClaimableRewardsByPeriodNumber
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the rewards from ended reward periods of a donor.

parameterDecorators.name: _lastPeriodNumber
parameterDecorators.description: last reward period number to be computed.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 sum of all donor's rewards that has not been claimed until _lastPeriodNumber.

functionDecorators.name: claimRewards
functionDecorators.description: Transfers to the sender the rewards.

functionDecorators.name: claimRewardsPartial
functionDecorators.description: Transfers to the sender the rewards.

functionDecorators.name: donate
functionDecorators.description: Transfers cUSD tokens to the treasury contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of cUSD tokens to deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegateAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the address that will claim the reward for the donation.

functionDecorators.name: donateToCommunity
functionDecorators.description: Transfers tokens to the community contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of cUSD tokens to deposit.

parameterDecorators.name: _delegateAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the address that will claim the reward for the donation.

functionDecorators.name: donorRewardPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Returns a reward period number from a donor reward period list.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 number of the reward period.

functionDecorators.name: donorScore
functionDecorators.description: Calculate the score of a user based as this ratio (his donation and staking) / (all donation and staking) E.G. score = 0.01 * 1e18 => the donor have have 1% score so he will get 1% of the reward.

functionDecorators.name: estimateClaimableReward
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the estimate reward of a donor for current reward period.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 reward that donor will receive in current reward period if there isn't another donation.

functionDecorators.name: estimateClaimableRewardAdvance
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the estimate reward of a donor for the next x reward periods.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 reward that donor will receive in current reward period if there isn't another donation.

functionDecorators.name: estimateClaimableRewardByStaking
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the estimate reward of a donor for current reward period based on his staking.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 estimated reward by donor stakes.

functionDecorators.name: generalApr
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the APR.

functionDecorators.name: getVersion
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current implementation version.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Used to initialize a new DonationMiner contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _firstRewardPerBlock
parameterDecorators.description: Number of PACTs given for each block from the first reward period.

parameterDecorators.name: _rewardPeriodSize
parameterDecorators.description: Number of blocks of the reward period.

parameterDecorators.name: _startingBlock
parameterDecorators.description: First block of the first reward period.

parameterDecorators.name: _decayNumerator
parameterDecorators.description: Decay numerator used for calculating the new reward per block based on the previous reward per block.

parameterDecorators.name: _decayDenominator
parameterDecorators.description: Decay denominator used for calculating the new reward per block based on the previous reward per block.

functionDecorators.name: lastPeriodsDonations
functionDecorators.description: Calculate all donations on the last X epochs as well as everyone else in the same period.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: rewardPeriodDonorAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of cUSD donated by a user in a reward period.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 amount of cUSD donated by the user in this reward period.

functionDecorators.name: rewardPeriodDonorStakeAmounts
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of PACT staked by a user at the and of the reward period.

returnDecorators.description: uint256 amount of PACT staked by a user at the and of the reward period.

functionDecorators.name: stakeRewards
functionDecorators.description: Stakes the reward.

functionDecorators.name: stakeRewardsPartial
functionDecorators.description: Stakes the reward.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfers an amount of an ERC20 from this contract to an address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateAgainstPeriods
functionDecorators.description: Updates againstPeriods value.

parameterDecorators.name: _newAgainstPeriods
parameterDecorators.description: Number of reward periods for the backward computation.

functionDecorators.name: updateClaimDelay
functionDecorators.description: Updates claimDelay value.

parameterDecorators.name: _newClaimDelay
parameterDecorators.description: Number of reward periods a donor has to wait after a donation until he will be able to claim his reward.

functionDecorators.name: updateCommunityDonationRatio
functionDecorators.description: Updates communityDonationRatio value.

parameterDecorators.name: _newCommunityDonationRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Ratio between 1USD donated into the treasury vs 1USD donated to a community.

functionDecorators.name: updateRewardPeriodParams
functionDecorators.description: Updates reward period default params.

functionDecorators.name: updateStaking
functionDecorators.description: Updates Staking address.

functionDecorators.name: updateStakingDonationRatio
functionDecorators.description: Updates stakingDonationRatio value.

parameterDecorators.name: _newStakingDonationRatio
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens that need to be staked to be counted as 1 PACT donated.

functionDecorators.name: updateTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Updates Treasury address.
